Embedding

centralized_nlp_package.embedding.embedding_utils.embed_text(tokens, model)[source]

Generates an embedding for the given list of tokens by averaging their vectors.

Parameters:

  • tokens (List[str]) – List of tokens (unigrams or bigrams).

  • model (Word2Vec) – Trained Word2Vec model.

Returns:

Averaged embedding vector or None if no tokens are in the model.

Return type:

Optional[np.ndarray]

centralized_nlp_package.embedding.embedding_utils.nearest_neighbors(words, model, num_neigh=50, regularize=False)[source]

Finds the nearest neighbor words for each topic based on the embeddings.

Parameters:

  • words (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing ‘label’ and ‘match’ columns.

  • model (Word2Vec) – Trained Word2Vec model.

  • num_neigh (int, optional) – Number of neighbors to retrieve. Defaults to 50.

  • regularize (bool, optional) – Whether to apply cosine similarity normalization. Defaults to False.

Returns:

DataFrame containing labels, embeddings, matched words, and similarity scores.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

centralized_nlp_package.embedding.word2vec_model.save_model(model, path)[source]

Saves the trained Word2Vec model to the specified path.

Parameters:

  • model (Word2Vec) – Trained Word2Vec model.

  • path (str) – File path to save the model.

Return type:

None

centralized_nlp_package.embedding.word2vec_model.train_word2vec(feed, gen_bigram, model_params)[source]

Trains a Word2Vec model on the provided corpus.

Parameters:

  • feed (List[List[str]]) – Corpus of tokenized sentences.

  • gen_bigram (bool) – Whether to generate bigrams.

  • model_params (Dict[str, Any]) – Parameters for Word2Vec.

Returns:

Trained Word2Vec model.

Return type:

Word2Vec
